```{r, echo = FALSE, results='asis'}
if(!is.na(text)){
  text <- paste(readLines(text), collapse=" ")
  text = gsub(pattern = "\\\\n", replacement = "  \n", x = text)
  text <- strsplit(text, "##")[[1]]
  cat(text[1])
}
```
